message: I have a unique opportunity for you to purchase a valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I've got a lot of interest in this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $13750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12500. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12750?
